title: Quorex Construction Services
author: ''

slug: quorex_construction_services
categories: []
tags: []
images:
  - /img/cover.png
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $7.0M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Quorex Construction Services. The average
  contract duration was 1.62 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $3.7M. The longest
  contract was 3.05 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $11.6M.
lookup_name: 'QUOREX CONSTRUCTION SERVICES'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '7.0M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '9'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '8'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '89%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '22%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '3.38'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '5.3M'
s424_mean_duration: '1.62'
s421_mean_contract_value: '3.7M'
s425_max_duration: '3.05'
s422_max_contract_value: '11.6M'
---
